subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Houston Astros selected Brady Aiken, a left-handed pitcher, with the first pick in the 2014 draft, the first time in more than two decades a high school pitcher was selected with the top pick.
snippet: The Houston Astros selected Brady Aiken, a left-handed pitcher, with the first pick in the 2014 draft, the first time in more than two decades a high school pitcher was selected with the top pick.
